text: Cédric Bétrémieux (born May 14, 1982) is a French footballer who is currently playing for Harelbeke in the Belgian Second Amateur Division. He previously played in the Belgian Pro League for Roeselare and Kortrijk. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:AC Cambrai players Category:K.S.K.
